TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DeleteTreeAccessRule extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectoryAccessRule
Public NotInheritable Class DeleteTreeAccessRule Inherits ActiveDirectoryAccessRule

Docs.summary: The class represents a specific type of access rule that is used to allow or deny an Active Directory Domain Services object the right to delete all child objects, regardless of the permissions that the child objects have.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
